title: Volcanic eruption may have triggered Europe's deadly Black Death plague
description: A volcanic eruption may have set off a chain reaction that led to Europe's deadliest pandemic.
content:
Helen BriggsEnvironment correspondent
The Black Death fundamentally altered medieval society
A volcanic eruption around 1345 may have set off a chain reaction that unleashed Europe's deadliest pand… [+2922 chars]
